definition: of or relating to the feet, a lever that is operated with the foot, operate the pedals on a keyboard instrument
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the feet
= example: of or relating to the feet
noun
- a lever that is operated with the foot
= synonyms: treadle, foot pedal, foot lever
- a sustained bass note
= synonyms: pedal point
verb
- operate the pedals on a keyboard instrument
- ride a bicycle
= synonyms: cycle, bicycle, bike, wheel
